attributes.action: IF Rt Hon Sajid Javid MP gets involved in the Thanet Local plans here our views
attributes.additional_details: You would not let us do our last Petition because you say it's not your problem I disagree because if Secretary of state Rt Hon Sajid Javid MP gets involved it is to do with Government
attributes.background:
Up to know only Thanet District Council has given Secretary of state Rt Hon Sajid Javid MP  there side of the story. We the Residents of Thanet would like to meet Secretary of state Rt Hon Sajid Javid MP 
To put our side views over .Because TDC will not Listen

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

If you'd like the Secretary of State to support the draft Local Plan for Thanet, you could start a new petition asking for that.

If you'd like the Government to consult local people in Thanet about the local plan, you could start a new petition asking for that.
